sqlMap.statement: DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES01 WHERE BJOBDMNDMSGID LIKE CONCAT(#uuid# , '%') AND MSGREGDATE BETWEEN #logStart# AND #logEnd#
DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES03 WHERE BJOBDMNDMSGID LIKE CONCAT(#uuid# , '%') AND FILETRSMTSTARTHMS BETWEEN #logStart# AND #logEnd#
DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES04 WHERE BJOBDMNDMSGID LIKE CONCAT(#uuid# , '%') AND DBTRSMTSTARTHMS BETWEEN #logStart# AND #logEnd#
DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES05 WHERE BJOBDMNDMSGID LIKE CONCAT(#uuid# , '%') AND ERRREGDATE BETWEEN #logStart# AND #logEnd#
